item.title: /welcome/
item.description: Introduction This will be a space dedicated to sharing studies and knowledge acquired during my personal journey in Cybersecurity and Red Team, which are deemed relevant or may assist those looking to gain more knowledge.
item.content:
Introduction

This will be a space dedicated to sharing studies and knowledge acquired during my personal journey in Cybersecurity and Red Team, which are deemed relevant or may assist those looking to gain more knowledge.
